text: Je loka apale dhana allahaci marji (prasannata) prapta karanyakarita manacya khusine ani visvasane kharca karatata, tyance udaharana tya bagesarakhe ahe ji jaminicya unca bhagavara asavi ani joradara pavasane ti apali phale duppata de'ila ani ticyavara pa'usa jari padala nahi, tari pavasaca halaka varsavahi puresa ahe ani allaha tumacya karmanna pahata ahe
